dishes.reason_for_strategy: The proportions of ingredients in a Caesar salad can vary significantly, making ingredient-level calculation more accurate than relying on a generic dish entry.

ingredients.reason_for_choice: Selected FDC ID 746769 (Lettuce, cos or romaine, raw) because: (1) It is a direct and accurate match for romaine lettuce in its raw state, as observed in the salad. (2) The Foundation data type is highly suitable for basic, unprocessed ingredients, providing reliable nutritional information. (3) It is compositionally appropriate and represents the primary leafy green component of the Caesar salad.

Selected FDC ID 172751 (Croutons, plain) because: (1) It directly matches the 'Croutons' ingredient, and the visual evidence suggests plain, unseasoned croutons. (2) The SR Legacy data type is appropriate for a common processed food item like croutons. (3) This choice provides a compositionally accurate representation of the bread component in the salad.

Selected FDC ID 325036 (Cheese, parmesan, grated) because: (1) It accurately describes the form of Parmesan cheese visible in the salad (grated). (2) The Foundation data type is ideal for a basic dairy product like cheese, ensuring high data quality. (3) This FDC ID provides a compositionally relevant match for the cheese component.

Selected FDC ID 169055 (Salad dressing, caesar dressing, regular) because: (1) It is a direct and generic match for 'Caesar dressing', which is appropriate given no specific brand or dietary restriction is indicated. (2) The SR Legacy data type is suitable for common prepared food items like salad dressings. (3) This choice provides a standard compositional profile for Caesar dressing.

(2) The SR Legacy data type is highly reliable for common raw produce. (3) This choice best reflects the likely type of tomato used in a typical pasta salad.

Selected FDC ID 168462 (Spinach, raw) because: (1) It aligns with the Phase 1 assumption for 'Green leafy vegetable' and is a common ingredient in pasta salads. (2) The SR Legacy data type provides robust nutritional data for raw vegetables. (3) This is the most compositionally relevant and generic option for a leafy green in this context.

Selected FDC ID 465354 (PASTA SAUCE, Branded, LES ALIMENTS O'SOLE MIO INC) because: (1) The ingredient list explicitly includes 'CREAM', which matches the visually observed creamy texture and color of the pasta sauce in the image. (2) While a branded item, its specific composition is more relevant than generic SR Legacy marinara sauces which do not appear to match the visual. (3) This choice provides a better compositional fit for the specific type of sauce observed.

ingredients.reason_for_choice: Selected FDC ID 171534 (Chicken, broiler or fryers, breast, skinless, boneless, meat only, cooked, grilled) because: (1) It represents a common and compositionally accurate form of cooked chicken found in pasta salads. (2) The SR Legacy data type is highly reliable for basic meat products. (3) This choice provides a good generic match for the chicken pieces visible in the dish.
